name: Gas Mask (BillyMan)
description:
Past a cave using your flamethrowe's recoil to reach the treasure.

(How to play: Shoots you in the opposite direction of your mouse, further the mouse => faster the movement) *should have put it better in the game

Sorry very rushed on the last end and tutorial.
